plot: In the mid-60's, a small Canadian mining town is paralyzed by a labor strike. A young waitress falls for a 'scab', a wandering strikebreaker who seeks only a brief encounter.
title: Dolorès
plot_es: In the mid-60's, a small Canadian mining town is paralyzed by a labor strike. A young waitress falls for a 'scab', a wandering strikebreaker who seeks only a brief encounter.
plot_en: In the mid-60's, a small Canadian mining town is paralyzed by a labor strike. A young waitress falls for a 'scab', a wandering strikebreaker who seeks only a brief encounter.
